Text.val: 02.12.2005 MW SCR#9661 --> Needed for Step3
02.12.2005 MW SCR#9600 --> Needed for Step8
Author: Martin Wenta (MW)
This program is calling from ODC003C only if GSET_YESNO (GSET_ID = 153) = Y
and performed some additional updates for legal collection.
12.08.2013 SH SCR18337 Extended BID707 argument list

to use only first 10 characters

changed calculation for the DCLC_INITIALBALANCEC/H in the step 2

<> '1' before any updates

DCLC_DATSTARTDELCREDEREINVST in Step2
02.12.2005 MW SCR#9600 --> Added step 8
02.12.2005 MW SCR#9661 --> extended the CND for the step3 & step4-call
save the current language
Calculate interest and costs and store DCLC row
Store INVOICE unbooked interest if v.LegalInterestC<>0
02.12.2005 MW SCR#9661 --> extended the CND
Store INVOICE unbooked interest if v.LegalInterestC<>0
02.12.2005 MW SCR#9661 --> extended the CND
Delete outstanding Credman advices
Add new debtor in the delcredere administration
04.01.2006 MW SCR#9981 --> Changed the param-sequence
Before booking set system language to client language
Set language back to the original language
... DEBC_CLIENTLIMITCODE before updates has to used for tests if step 8 (BAD013)
has to be performed
Step 5: Additional updates in DEBTOR_CLIENT

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and INVO_LEGALCOLLECTION = 'Y'

Text.val: Call BAD410 to calculate interest and costs
If there is no row available store one
Task to check if INVU with amount <> 0 exists so MF instead of link
